video.title: Para Volver a Amar
video.synopsis: Six women will learn that happiness is within reach, but that it doesn't last forever.

episodes.synopsis: Close to her anniversary, Antonia meets Yorley; she allows Paola to go to Ajusco to train.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Bárbara's pregnancy test comes out positive. Ferrer promotes Jorge to Manager.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Antonia tells Braulio to quit his job as soon as his daughter leaves intensive therapy.  Mayte is mad at her mate: she was fired after his promotion.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Braulio forbids Valeria to try to locate her family. While Antonia thinks about starting her own company, Jaime beats Bárbara for getting a job.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: David wishes he hadn't sold his house but, because he can't undo the sale, he tells Yorley the truth. Antonia hires Bárbara as a saleswoman.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: After Jaime's beating, Bárbara loses her baby. Upon resigning, Rosaura tells Braulio about Antonia's new company.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Jaime thinks Bárbara is pregnant; she confides to Antonia that she lost her baby because of the beating her husband gave her. Antonia hires Yorley.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Mayte offers herself as sales manager to Antonia, who convenes her employees so they can meet each other. Bárbara rebels against Jaime.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Braulio causes Antonia to lose a business deal. Jaime regales Mayte with a romantic dinner and a gift.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: David gets a pittance for his house. While Braulio and Antonia prepare for the real estate fair, Bárbara tires of her mother-in-law's humiliations.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Patricio sends Antonia flowers to wish her well in the fair. When he and Bárbara meet, she falls in love with him.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: After stealing sales material from Mayte, Marcial is exposed as a thief to everyone at the fair. Bárbara learns that Patricio is Antonia's husband.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Charito warns Renato that Pavel is stealing money from him, but Renato defends the man. Mayte and Bárbara enjoy sales success at the real estate fair.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Antonio reveals her cancer to Renato and asks him to keep it a secret. Valeria's mom asks Faver to find his sister; she wants to see her before dying.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: While Yorley has a romantic reconciliation with David, Valeria shuns intimacy with Braulio. Antonia's doctor says it's time for chemotherapy.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: César comes out swinging, Braulio wants to send Valeria away, Antonia and Braulio will work together and Mayte can't take it any more with Jorge.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Because Braulio doesn't want Valeria to see her family, he gives her a trip for her birthday.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Yorley rebukes Marcial, Braulio plans to con Mayte, Jaime thinks Bárbara is cheating on him with Alcides, and Faver shows up with Valeria.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: When Faver rebukes Valeria for not visiting her dying mother, she tells him she knew nothing about it, and blames Braulio. Marcial tricks Mayte.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Antonia goes to her first chemotherapy session, David takes leave of his family in a letter, and Jaime's and Bárbara's problems come to light.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: In Antonia's offices, Jaime subjects Bárbara to a fit of jealousy when he sees her chatting with Alcides. Despite Braulio, Valeria finds her family.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: David is robbed on the highway, Rosaura finds Rolando kissing Mireya and Yorley learns that Fanny works in a greasy spoon.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: Wanting to file for divorce, Mayte seeks Patricio's advice. David arrives with a group of people who also want to cross the border.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: When a man ties to abuse her daughter, Yorley has a moment of anguish. Bárbara is surprised by the change in her husband.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: When María Luisa, a reputed journalist, interviews Braulio's entire family at home, the atmosphere is tense: Valeria is tired of living a farce.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: When Sebastián returns Pao's wallet to her, she kisses him. Antonia changes her look and Chinto sues Yorley.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: Marcial extorts a bank employee so that he can sell the properties handled exclusively by Antonia's realty company.
episodes.title: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: Montse asks Valeria to help her avoid losing the house and store that belong to her and her father. Mayte and her husband fight over losing Benito.
episodes.title: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: Charito thinks Alcides is Bárbara's lover. Valeria tries and fails to find work while Torres signs the sales contract for a lot with Antonia's firm.
episodes.title: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: Jorge tells Mayte to speed up her divorce after she offers to buy half of his apartment. Pao falls in love with Sebastián.
episodes.title: Episode 30

episodes.synopsis: To gain independence from Braulio, Valeria starts a pastry business. Sebastián breaks Pao's heart at a dinner date: he'll pursue an MA in the US.
episodes.title: Episode 31

episodes.synopsis: Antonia's tumor resists treatment and she begins to lose her hair. Jorge and Mayte kiss passionately while Bárbara's rejections infuriate Jaime.
episodes.title: Episode 32

episodes.synopsis: Bárbara and Patricio have close encounters while Laila consoles Jorge. Sebastián will work in the realty company with Braulio, and Mayte will complain.
episodes.title: Episode 33

episodes.synopsis: Everyone vents his or her problems. Bárbara plays a joke on Rolando, Patricio takes her to his place. Antonia is jealous and Patricio conflicted.
episodes.title: Episode 34

episodes.synopsis: Mayte reveals nothing to Antonia of the problems she's having with the land where the macromall will be built.
episodes.title: Episode 35

episodes.synopsis: Mayte and Jorge make love. Pao contradicts Antonia. César will get into crooked deals. Sebastián looks for Pao and finds that Valeria left.
episodes.title: Episode 36

episodes.synopsis: Patricio and Pao are miffed at Antonia: they know she's hiding something from them. Antonia learns that Mayte menaced the people who live on the lot.
episodes.title: Episode 37

episodes.synopsis: Yorley accidentally hears of Antonia's cancer. After Mayte warns Marcial that she'll tell Antonia they set a trap for her, Braulio offers her a job.
episodes.title: Episode 38

episodes.synopsis: After Antonia and Patricio argue because he won't tell her the truth about his health, he invites Bárbara out.
episodes.title: Episode 39

episodes.synopsis: Antonia declares bankruptcy. Jorge's company is giving him a luxury car, and Mayte is furious because she's just sold hers to get needed cash.
episodes.title: Episode 40

episodes.synopsis: Yorley's secret negotiations with the people on the lot succeed: she convinces them to sell their property in exchange for another house.
episodes.title: Episode 41

episodes.synopsis: Jorge asks Patricio why Mayte has financial problems. Yorley and Leonardo save Antonia's company when they close the deal with the people on the lot.
episodes.title: Episode 42

episodes.synopsis: Bárbara catches Patricio and Antonia in a compromising situation. Alcides confesses to Renato that he's in love.
episodes.title: Episode 43

episodes.synopsis: Quintín tells Fanny that her parents aren't married. Yorley spills coffee on the sale contract. Mayte returns Jorge's money. She'll work with Braulio.
episodes.title: Episode 44

episodes.synopsis: Valeria tells Sebastián that she'll divorce Braulio. Yorley saves the deal with Torres and tells Antonia she did it to help her since she has cancer.
episodes.title: Episode 45

episodes.synopsis: Sebastián tells Braulio that Valeria has left home. When Leonardo invites Yorley to dinner, she tells him she can't accept because she's married.
episodes.title: Episode 46

episodes.synopsis: David is very worried about Yorley and her daughter. Antonia delegates all the responsibility for the realty to Mayte.
episodes.title: Episode 47

episodes.synopsis: After Jaime hits Bárbara for confusing him with Patricio, she calls Patricio so that he'll help her go after Jaime.
episodes.title: Episode 48

episodes.synopsis: Conchita blames Bárbara for Jaime's imprisonment. Valeria is taken to a tenement house so that she can rent a room.
episodes.title: Episode 49

episodes.synopsis: Jorge has a great time with Denisse, but has a love tryst with Mayte. Rolando tells Rosaura that Mireya is the only one for him.
episodes.title: Episode 50

episodes.synopsis: Mayte doesn't go to work with Braulio. Torres gives Yorley a new bicycle. Sebastián admits missing Valeria. César won't return to school.
episodes.title: Episode 51

episodes.synopsis: David upbraids Yorley and tells her he has another woman. Valeria asks Antonia for work. Mayte finds Denisse in Jorge's apartment.
episodes.title: Episode 52

episodes.synopsis: Mayte feels terrible after seeing Denisse in Jorge's apartment. Yorley berates Quintín for opening a rift between her and David, who has left her.
episodes.title: Episode 53

episodes.synopsis: While Rodrigo tries to seduce Valeria, Jorge takes flowers to Denisse, toward whom he feels something very special, as he says to Mayte.
episodes.title: Episode 54

episodes.synopsis: Jenny suffers a fainting spell when she learns that Rolando will marry Mireya. Antonia hires Valeria.
episodes.title: Episode 55

episodes.synopsis: Paola prepares dinner for Sebastián, who demands Valeria's resignation. Jaime, drunk again, looks for Bárbara.
episodes.title: Episode 56

episodes.synopsis: Patricio looks for Bárbara in the hospital. While César goes on committing crimes, Braulio plans to evict Faver.
episodes.title: Episode 57

episodes.synopsis: Antonia argues with Patricio as Mayte struggles to get Jorge's attention. Bárbara will abandon Jaime while Montse and Faver look for Valeria.
episodes.title: Episode 58

episodes.synopsis: Antonia discovers something of Patricio's among Bárbara's things, while Patricio finds mysterious dates in Antonia's diary.
episodes.title: Episode 59

episodes.synopsis: Bárbara tells Jaime that he is to blame for her miscarriage, and Mayte fights with Denisse.
episodes.title: Episode 60

episodes.synopsis: Jaime will impregnate Bárbara again, Yorley will work in Torres' house, and Braulio will give Valeria her divorce. Sebastián apologizes to Pao.
episodes.title: Episode 61

episodes.synopsis: Jaime kidnaps Bárbara and detains her in his house, but she escapes through the window.
episodes.title: Episode 62

episodes.synopsis: Jaime speaks to Antonia of Bárbara and Patricio, who are out dancing. Mayte asks Jorge to consider a reconciliation.
episodes.title: Episode 63

episodes.synopsis: While Braulio investigates Sebastián's girlfriend, Jaime wants to take Bárbara away by force. Pao asks Patricio if he's in love with another woman.
episodes.title: Episode 64

episodes.synopsis: Sebastián tells Pao that she's very important to him. When Rosaura decides to sell her house to pay for her liposuction, Rolando wants to swindle her.
episodes.title: Episode 65

episodes.synopsis: When Yorley goes out to dinner with Torres, Fanny steals his wallet.
episodes.title: Episode 66

episodes.synopsis: Jaime and his mom accuse Bárbara of robbery and battery. Mayte tells Antonia that Denisse is after Patricio. Sebastián tells Valeria to quit her job.
episodes.title: Episode 67

episodes.synopsis: Mayte and Denisse fight when they meet at the Mas Casa Inmobiliaria real estate event. Marcial humiliates Yorley and Torres defends her.
episodes.title: Episode 68

episodes.synopsis: Bárbara is arrested after the complaint filed by Jaime and his mother. Leonardo tells Yorley that his wife died of cancer; they kiss.
episodes.title: Episode 69

episodes.synopsis: Everyone who knows Yorley is looking for her daughter. Bárbara tells her companions that she was pregnant, and that Jaime killed her baby.
episodes.title: Episode 70

episodes.synopsis: Although Antonia wants to tell Patricio and Pao the truth about her illness, they won't let her, so she makes a videotape in which she tells all.
episodes.title: Episode 71

episodes.synopsis: During her operation, Antonia has two cardiac arrests. Patricio doesn't see the videotape she left him, goes to Acapulco but doesn't find her there.
episodes.title: Episode 72

episodes.synopsis: When Bárbara goes to Jaime's place to collect her things, she steals some plane tickets from him. They'll get her to Acapulco.
episodes.title: Episode 73

episodes.synopsis: Pao apologizes to her mother for all her mistreatment of her. Patricio meets Bárbara in Acapulco, where Jaime is desperately seeking her.
episodes.title: Episode 74

episodes.synopsis: Bárbara and Patricio pass a magical night together until Jaime finds them, beats Patricio and is arrested. Then Patricio learns of Antonia's cancer.
episodes.title: Episode 75

episodes.synopsis: Antonia thinks she's lost Patricio. Yorley has told her that Bárbara was in Acapulco; she deduces that she was with Patricio and that they're lovers.
episodes.title: Episode 76

episodes.synopsis: Mayte tells Marcial that Bárbara sold the most expensive apartment in the Torres project. Torres takes Yorley out and offers her an attractive deal.
episodes.title: Episode 77

episodes.synopsis: David will get involved in a crooked deal with Cindy. Torres tells Yorley that he'll teach her the real estate business and make a saleswoman of her.
episodes.title: Episode 78

episodes.synopsis: Antonia summons everyone to her home to confess that she didn't go to Acapulco because she had cancer surgery. She damns Bárbara for seducing Patricio.
episodes.title: Episode 79

episodes.synopsis: Antonia and Mayte force Bárbara out of the realty firm. Patricio accuses Antonia of being unfair; he claims nothing happened between him and Bárbara.
episodes.title: Episode 80

episodes.synopsis: Braulio learns that Doménica isn't a social climber. Now that Valeria is out of Torres' business, she'll try to do business with Sergio.
episodes.title: Episode 81

episodes.synopsis: Marcial threatens to tell everything he knows about Valeria if she reveals that he stole Antonia's prospect data sheets and customers.
episodes.title: Episode 82

episodes.synopsis: Jaime wants to create a rift between Patricio and Bárbara, on one side and, on the other, Antonia, who asks Patricio to leave her home.
episodes.title: Episode 83

episodes.synopsis: Patricio moves in with Jorge after being ousted by Antonia despite Pao's reproaches. Mireya returns drunk from her bachelorette party.
episodes.title: Episode 84

episodes.synopsis: Mireya encounters César in a supermarket he and his friends are robbing. Concerned about his son César, Rolando arrives and tries to save Mireya.
episodes.title: Episode 85

episodes.synopsis: César gives Rosaura money from the robbery for her operation. Desperate, Mayte cries after Jorge yells at her, demanding that she respect Denisse.
episodes.title: Episode 86

episodes.synopsis: When Patricio decides to find Bárbara, he and Jaime have a fistfight. Meanwhile, Jorge tells Mayte he's going to put the apartment in Denisse's name.
episodes.title: Episode 87

episodes.synopsis: Yorley accepts having a relationship with Torres. Quintín invites Charito out. David is thinking of marrying someone to get American nationality.
episodes.title: Episode 88

episodes.synopsis: Conchita takes Bárbara to a park so that she can escape while Jaime looks for her at the realty office. Everyone thinks she's taken off with Patricio.
episodes.title: Episode 89

episodes.synopsis: Mayte wants to conquer Sergio. Yorley confides to Renato that being with Torres makes her feel really calm and contented; he tells her that's love.
episodes.title: Episode 90

episodes.synopsis: Jaime seeks Bárbara in the hospital where he was told she was, but doesn't find her. He thinks Patricio took her, and warns Antonia he'll kill him.
episodes.title: Episode 91

episodes.synopsis: Blanca tells Honorio that if he doesn't go steady with her, she'll put his loved ones in jail. Meanwhile, Gonzalo and Fina are divorced.
episodes.title: Episode 92

episodes.synopsis: Mayte calls Jaime to say that she'll tell him where Bárbara is. Sergio continues to help Bárbara to pull through and recover from what Jaime did to her.
episodes.title: Episode 93

episodes.synopsis: Jaime attacks Mayte to force her to say where Bárbara is. Alcides rescues her, but she reveals that Bárbara is with Sergio. Antonia's cancer is cured.
episodes.title: Episode 94

episodes.synopsis: Jorge ruins Mayte's sale of her apartment and warns her that he, too, will make her suffer. Rosaura surprises all with the outcome of her liposuction.
episodes.title: Episode 95

episodes.synopsis: Antonia asks Bárbara to pardon her offenses, and rehires her.  Sebastián puts the brakes on Marcial. Rosaura prepares Rolando's birthday party.
episodes.title: Episode 96

episodes.synopsis: Antonia tells Pao that she made a mistake with her dad, who had nothing to do with Bárbara. Rolando enjoys his birthday with his children and Rosaura.
episodes.title: Episode 97

episodes.synopsis: Valeria confides to Rodrigo that her mother sold her with Braulio, who wants her to go back to him. Rolando is going to visit Rosaura.
episodes.title: Episode 98

episodes.synopsis: While chatting with Patricio, Torres mentions that his wife died of cancer; since Antonia was luckily cured, he advises him to take good care of her.
episodes.title: Episode 99

episodes.synopsis: Antonia and Patricio make up. Mayte introduces Leonel Serrano, her new salesman, to Antonia. Marcial tries to blackmail Valeria, who calls Braulio in.
episodes.title: Episode 100

episodes.synopsis: Rosaura goes to see Bárbara and they are reconciled. Montse's doctor tells Valeria that the girl has leukemia. Antonia is more enthusiastic than ever.
episodes.title: Episode 101

episodes.synopsis: When Braulio's lover goes to his place to see him, he gets furious and warns her that that's no place for her. Torres and Fanny cook food for Yorley.
episodes.title: Episode 102

episodes.synopsis: When Mireya surprises Rosaura and Rolando together, she breaks off with Rolando, who returns to Rosaura. Slowly Bárbara recalls what happened to her.
episodes.title: Episode 103

episodes.synopsis: Antonia tells Pao that Sebastián doesn't know Valeria has a family, since Braulio has hidden this from her due to their lowly origins.
episodes.title: Episode 104

episodes.synopsis: When Rodrigo tells Braulio that he no longer wants to seduce Valeria, Braulio assumes that he's in love with her. Rolando has an affair with a Cuban.
episodes.title: Episode 105

episodes.synopsis: César is surprised by Jaime, who threatens him in an attempt to get Bárbara out of the shelter, but César finds a way out.
episodes.title: Episode 106

episodes.synopsis: Drunk, Mireya goes to Rolando's place and raises a stink. Passion flares between Rodrigo and Valeria; afterwards she has regrets and kicks him out.
episodes.title: Episode 107

episodes.synopsis: Antonia and Torres defend Yorley against Mayte and Marcial. Braulio gives his lover Doménica a car because he thinks she has a tape that can harm him.
episodes.title: Episode 108

episodes.synopsis: Faver has an accident, injures a person and is arrested. César learns that Rolando plans to take the money from the sale of the house to Rosaura.
episodes.title: Episode 109

episodes.synopsis: Because of Rolando, César leaves home; Rosaura is crushed. Braulio tells Rodrigo it's time to destroy Valeria, who is accused of fraud by Mayte.
episodes.title: Episode 110

episodes.synopsis: Braulio and Marcial succeed in getting Valeria to live with Braulio again, in exchange for Faver's freedom and medical care abroad for Montse.
episodes.title: Episode 111

episodes.synopsis: Miranda tells Mayte that she will resign as her lawyer because she thinks what Mayte is doing to Jorge is wrong. Doménica blackmails Braulio.
episodes.title: Episode 112

episodes.synopsis: Bárbara goes back to work at the realty firm. Valeria tells Braulio that she'll no longer take his abuses, and warns him against alienating her from her family.
episodes.title: Episode 113

episodes.synopsis: Braulio hits Marcial when he says that he and Sebastián have fallen into Doménica's traps. Rosaura and Bárbara are worried: Jaime has disappeared.
episodes.title: Episode 114

episodes.synopsis: Yorley and Torres spend a night together living their love. César goes to Rosaura's, Rolando insults him and he runs. David returns from the US.
episodes.title: Episode 115

episodes.synopsis: Fanny is delighted to see David again; she tells him they haven't slept because Torres, her mother's boyfriend, took them for a spin.
episodes.title: Episode 116

episodes.synopsis: Sebastián introduces Doménica to Valeria. Jenny chides Rolando for letting César leave the house, despite knowing that he's going to divorce Rosaura.
episodes.title: Episode 117

episodes.synopsis: When Valeria learns that Marcial and Mayte are in cahoots, she tells Antonia. An argument between Antonia and Mayte ends with Mayte's dismissal.
episodes.title: Episode 118

episodes.synopsis: Yorley slaps David when he slams her relationship with Torres. She blames him for Fanny's going to work, and says she came close to being abused.
episodes.title: Episode 119

episodes.synopsis: Doménica puts Braulio to the test by presenting him to her family. Sebastian's absence depresses Pao; when she phones him, Doménica answers.
episodes.title: Episode 120

episodes.synopsis: Charito and Renato are pleasantly surprised when Antonia and Alcides prepare a birthday party for them. David arrives exuding jealousy toward Yorley.
episodes.title: Episode 121

episodes.synopsis: Rolando sneaks out of Rosaura's house. Pao tells Antonia that a woman answered when she phoned Sebastián. Braulio shames Mayte for threatening him.
episodes.title: Episode 122

episodes.synopsis: Jenny and Rosaura receive the invitation to Rolando's and Mireya's wedding. Fanny gives David Yorley's savings so he can buy an embroidery machine.
episodes.title: Episode 123

episodes.synopsis: César decides to confront Rolando regarding his upcoming wedding. When Jenny learns of her dad's plans she makes Mireya think he's unfaithful.
episodes.title: Episode 124

episodes.synopsis: When Mireya evicts Rolando after seeing him with another woman, he goes back to live with Rosaura. Valeria tells Pao to fight for Sebastian's love.
episodes.title: Episode 125

episodes.synopsis: Valeria tells Faver that she loves Rodrigo. Mireya shames Rosaura by questioning her dignity for leaving Rolando after seeing him with another woman.
episodes.title: Episode 126

episodes.synopsis: Yorley slaps David, warning him that if he tries to take Fanny away, she'll accuse him of kidnapping. Jenny and Rosaura are evicted by the new owner.
episodes.title: Episode 127

episodes.synopsis: When Antonia gives Mayte her release, she tears it up, saying she doesn't need it. Braulio sees a tape of Valeria and Rodrigo declaring their love.
episodes.title: Episode 128

episodes.synopsis: Jorge proposes marriage to Denisse in the pool hall where she works. Braulio beats Valeria and shows her the tape showing her having sex with Rodrigo.
episodes.title: Episode 129

episodes.synopsis: Jaime tells Bárbara that the baby she's expecting is his. Rodrigo confronts Braulio over Valeria's love.
episodes.title: Episode 130

episodes.synopsis: Conchita tells Jaime that life with his dad was hell, because he battered her. Antonio confronts Patricio: she wants to discuss the breast she lost.
episodes.title: Episode 131

episodes.synopsis: César beats Dilan and tells Jenny to go back home, although she doesn't want to. Marcial takes advantage of Mayte's drunkenness to take her to bed.
episodes.title: Episode 132

episodes.synopsis: Jaime takes Conchita to a home. When she's not accepted, he gets angry. Faver faints from hunger. César is planning to rob an armored van.
episodes.title: Episode 133

episodes.synopsis: Jaime sees Bárbara with Sergio, gets drunk and goes on battering his mom. Valeria learns that Doménica was Braulio's and Rodrigo's lover.
episodes.title: Episode 134

episodes.synopsis: The doctor tells Bárbara she has AIDS. Pavel is brutally beaten by some thugs he owes money to.
episodes.title: Episode 135

episodes.synopsis: After an enraged Jaime shoots his mom, the doctor tells him she won't walk again. When they steal a car, César and his friends nearly get arrested.
episodes.title: Episode 136

episodes.synopsis: Quintín overhears Antonia speaking with Yorley and Rosaura about Bárbara's disease; he thinks Alcides has AIDS. Mayte and Jorge sign their divorce.
episodes.title: Episode 137

episodes.synopsis: Quintín fights with Alcides because he thinks he's Charito's boyfriend. Fanny's teacher tells Yorley that her daughter will be held back.
episodes.title: Episode 138

episodes.synopsis: Rosaura, Jenny and César attend Rolando's and Mireya's wedding. Sebastián finds Pao and offers her his friendship.
episodes.title: Episode 139

episodes.synopsis: Rolando's and Mireya's wedding is a disaster, making her feel very frustrated. Yorley accuses David of stealing her money, and Quintín ejects him.
episodes.title: Episode 140

episodes.synopsis: Despite all the harm Conchita has done her, Bárbara offers to take care of the woman. Jaime sacks her house, leaving it empty.
episodes.title: Episode 141

episodes.synopsis: When Braulio accidentally kills Doménica, he asks Marcial to dispose of the body. He is made chairman of the National Property Development Council.
episodes.title: Episode 142

episodes.synopsis: Alcides tells Bárbara that he prefers to live a lie with Charito than to be persecuted for his homosexuality. Jaime wants to get away from Conchita.
episodes.title: Episode 143

episodes.synopsis: Conchita sets a trap for Jaime so that the police arrest him for rape. Marcial threatens Braulio, saying he'll accuse Sebastián of murdering Doménica.
episodes.title: Episode 144

episodes.synopsis: Charito and Alcides marry despite the fact that he's gay. Braulio offers Marcial half of his company if he pleads guilty to Doménica's death.
episodes.title: Episode 145

episodes.synopsis: César loses his life and his friends are arrested. Jaime is in prison while Bárbara takes care of Conchita while living happily with Sergio.
episodes.title: Episode 146
